Tow Check Project

An iOS Project

About the project

Tow Check makes GET requests to the City of Chicago Data Portal API for recently towed cars. Users can quickly find their towed car with the phone number and address of the tow facility that towed it. Parsing via Codable. Uses GCD to make network requests on background threads. Programatic UI. Dynamic text. MVC. iOS 13 ready. Custom search filters. Dark mode.
